programlisting:
bucket := flag.String("b", "", "The bucket to which the stream is uploaded") filename := flag.String("f", "", "The file to upload to the bucket") key := flag.String("k", "", "The name of the object in the bucket") flag.Parse()
if *bucket == "" || *filename == "" || *key == "" { fmt.Println("You must supply a bucket name (-b BUCKET), filename (-f FILENAME), and key value (-k KEY)") return }
